verses.verse: Oh <S%H3863><s%> that you would tear <S%H7167><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, that you would come down <S%H3381><s%>, that the mountains <S%H2022><s%> might flow down <S%H2151><s%> at your presence <S%H6440><s%>,

As when the melting <S%H2003><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> burns <S%H6919><s%>, the fire <S%H784><s%> causes the waters <S%H4325><s%> to boil <S%H1158><s%>, to make your name <S%H8034><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> to your adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, that the nations <S%H1471><s%> may tremble <S%H7264><s%> at your presence <S%H6440><s%>!

When you did <S%H6213><s%> terrible things <S%H3372><s%> which we looked <S%H6960><s%> not for <S%H3381><s%>, you came down, the mountains <S%H2022><s%> flowed down <S%H2151><s%> at your presence <S%H6440><s%>.

For since the beginning of the world <S%H5769><s%> men have not heard <S%H8085><s%>, nor perceived by the ear <S%H238><s%>, neither has the eye <S%H5869><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, beside <S%H2108><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, what he has prepared for him that waits for him <S%H2442><s%>.

You meet <S%H6293><s%> him that rejoices <S%H7797><s%> and works <S%H6213><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, those that remember <S%H2142><s%> you in your ways <S%H1870><s%>: behold <S%H7107><s%>, you are angry; for we have sinned <S%H2398><s%> continually <S%H5769><s%>, and shall we be saved <S%H3467><s%>?

But we are all as a unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing <S%H6666><s%>, and all our righteousnesses are as filthy <S%H5708><s%> rags <S%H899><s%>; and we all do fade <S%H5034><s%> as a leaf <S%H5929><s%>; and our iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, like the wind <S%H7307><s%>, have taken us away <S%H5375><s%>.

And there is none that calls <S%H7121><s%> upon your name <S%H8034><s%>, that stirs up <S%H5782><s%> himself to take hold <S%H2388><s%> of you <S%H5641><s%>: for you have hid your face <S%H6440><s%> from us <S%H4127><s%>, and have consumed us <S%H3027><s%>, because of our iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
But now <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, you are our father <S%H1><s%>; we are the clay <S%H2563><s%>, and you our potter <S%H3335><s%>; and we all are the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Be not angry <S%H7107><s%> very severely <S%H3966><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, neither remember <S%H2142><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>: behold <S%H5027><s%>, see, we beg you <S%H5971><s%>, we are all your people.
Your holy <S%H6944><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are a wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, Zion <S%H6726><s%> is a wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a desolation <S%H8077><s%>.

Our holy <S%H6944><s%> and our beautiful <S%H8597><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, where our fathers <S%H1><s%> praised <S%H1984><s%> you <S%H8316><s%>, is burned up with fire <S%H784><s%>: and all our pleasant things <S%H4261><s%> are laid waste <S%H2723><s%>.
Will you refrain <S%H662><s%> yourself for these things <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord? will you hold your peace <S%H2814><s%>, and afflict <S%H6031><s%> us very severely <S%H3966><s%>?
